SEARCH
Package org.example.utility.api

Class APIClient

java.lang.Object
org.example.utility.api.APIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Deployment
public class APIClient extends Object implements Deployment
APIClient class handles the interaction with external APIs to fetch course recommendations based on user interests. It supports concurrent API requests with timeout management and error handling. The class implements the Deployment interface to manage the deployment process.

  • Constructor Details

    • APIClient

  • Method Details

    • getAPIDataClasses

      public static ArrayList<String> getAPIDataClasses(String interests)
      Fetches course data based on user interests from external APIs. The method makes concurrent requests to two URLs (primary and backup) until it successfully receives data.
      Parameters:
      interests - The interests of the user to filter course recommendations.
      Returns:
      A list of course codes recommended based on the provided interests.

    • parseJsonResponse

      private static void parseJsonResponse(String responseData, ArrayList<String> courses)
      Parses the JSON response from the API and extracts course codes into the provided list.
      Parameters:
      responseData - The raw JSON response as a string from the API.
      courses - The list to populate with course codes.

    • fetchDataFromUrlClasses

      private static String fetchDataFromUrlClasses(String apiUrl, String encodedInterests)
      Fetches data from a given URL using the GET method, with error handling and timeout management.
      Parameters:
      apiUrl - The URL to fetch data from.
      encodedInterests - The encoded interests parameter to be included in the request.
      Returns:
      The raw response data as a string, or null if the request fails.

    • runAPI

      public static void runAPI()
      A method to perform a POST request to an API endpoint. The URL is fetched from the CourseAssembly class credentials file.
